pages.text: There are many different ammo types in Terramity.$(br2)Guns in Terramity will only take their specificed ammo type.$(br2)Guns display what ammo type they take in the ammo counter overlay when you hold them out.

For example, the basic rifle only takes gold rounds, which are fairly cheap and even farmable in most modpacks. If ammo becomes tight, make a $(l:terramity:misc/bomb_flower)Bomb Flower$() farm for gunpowder!
